title: Custom VLC Media Player for Raspberry Pi 4 with MMAL and SRT Protocol Support - Upwork
description: Description: We are seeking a skilled developer to create a custom version of VLC media player for the Raspberry Pi 4 that supports both MMAL (Multi-Media Abstraction Layer) for hardware acceleration and the Secure Reliable Transport (SRT) protocol. This project aims to enhance the video streaming capabilities of VLC on the Raspberry Pi 4, ensuring smooth playback and reliable, secure streaming over unpredictable networks. Responsibilities: • Compile and customize VLC media player to run efficiently on Raspberry Pi 4. • Integrate MMAL support to ensure hardware acceleration is utilized for video decoding, significantly improving playback performance. • Implement SRT protocol support for VLC, enabling secure and reliable video streaming over lossy or congested networks. • Conduct thorough testing to ensure stability, performance, and compatibility. • Provide clear documentation on the customization and setup process for future reference and modifications. Requirements: • Proven experience working with the VLC media player source code and customization. • Strong knowledge of C/C++ programming languages. • Experience with Raspberry Pi development, including familiarity with the MMAL API for hardware acceleration. • Understanding of streaming protocols, specifically the SRT protocol, and network programming. • Ability to work independently and deliver a polished, bug-free final product. • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. • Strong communication skills to report progress and any challenges encountered. Deliverables: • A fully functional, custom version of VLC for Raspberry Pi 4 that supports MMAL and SRT protocol. • Complete source code of the customized VLC media player. • Documentation covering the build process, implementation details, and usage instructions. We are looking for someone who can start immediately and deliver a high-quality, efficient solution within our timeline and budget. If you have the expertise and are passionate about contributing to an exciting project that enhances multimedia capabilities on the Raspberry Pi 4, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of previous similar projects you have worked on and your approach to tackling this project.Skills: Linux, Raspberry Pi, Raspberry Pi Firmware, Embedded System, Embedded Linux

title: Senior UI designer needed for interface redesign of simple cookbook website - Upwork
description: Kasserole.com is a simple, web based app that generates and organizes recipes into an online cookbook. The goal of this project is to reskin the app with a modern UI. There will be no changes to functionality inside the app. This project does not require updating any copy or UX changes. The redesign of the app should be based on the principles of simple, black and white, modern and clean — with Bon Appetit (https://www.bonappetit.com/) as the design reference, along with https://cooking.nytimes.com/ as a backup. We’re not looking for something groundbreaking, but a simple design that aligns with web design best practices. This project is a 3 week engagement, with the potential for additional work based on the quality of the output. The deliverables for this project will be a set of Figma screens that can be handed off to a developer for implementation. The key pieces of the project include: - Creating before and after screens, with screenshots of all existing screens and mockups of the new design that will replace each of them (this should be developer-ready, with annotations for any animation and interactions). - Responsive design that matches existing functionality. - A limited style and component library to ensure consistency and ease of development. To understand the app, you can create a sample account with the invite code "mushroom”. The core features of the app are: - Uploading an image of a cookbook page and having the recipe scanned and saved to your Kasserole account. - Linking to the URL of a recipe and having the recipe scanned and saved to your Kasserole account. - Listing a series of ingredients and having Kasserole generate a recipe that uses them (with image generation). - Creating and uploading a recipe from scratch (manual text + image input). - All recipes (uploaded or created) have AI generated nutritional information and tagging based on the meal type. There is also image generation for new recipes. - Existing recipes can be modified to fit various dietary needs, with adjustments to the recipe generated by AI. - All recipes are searchable and filterable by meal type or nutritional information. - Access to a private cookbook of all recipes created by the user account. - Access to a shared cookbook where you can see all recipes generated by Kasserole users. To apply for this role, please include a link to a screenshot of the Kasserole app (post-login). Please also include links to past projects that align with this work.Skills: Figma, High Fidelity Design, App Design, Web Design, Mockup
